quote: Where all was burnt to ash before them no fires were to be had and the nights were long and dark and cold beyond anything they'd yet encountered. Cold to crack the stones. To take your life.
quote_letters: WHERE ALL WAS BURNT TO ASH BEFORE THEM NO FIRES WERE TO BE HAD AND THE NIGHTS WERE LONG AND DARK AND COLD BEYOND ANYTHING THEYD YET ENCOUNTERED COLD TO CRACK THE STONES TO TAKE YOUR LIFE
